â€œI wasn't crazy about Dopium initially -- it felt anxiety-inducing because I was expecting it to be more of a downer, but had I been in the mood for a Sativa, it probably would have turned out fine. I gave it another chance in the daytime and found it to be one of the most creative strains I have tried in a while. For that reason alone, I'd mark it as a favorite.â€
